frontline_engagement.comment: Drives frontline engagement positioning. Use distance and/or angle (degrees) to set placement around the enemy.

idle.comment: Follows the party leader when idle. Does nothing if you are the party leader.
Calls trusts based on the spells configured in vars.ensure_trusts.spells. Recalls trusts on low HP/MP.
Uses the appropriate XP or CP rings based on current level and mastery.
Uses common usable item drops, such as silt and bead pouches, and UNM coffers (work in progress).
